thread.section_title: OnDeck Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OnDeck | ondeck.com | 2 of 39
thread.title: Michael Halligan

author: Michael Halligan
title: Michael Halligan
text: Never get a loan from these people, I was told there was no prepayment penalties for getting a loan from On Deck, turns out that if you get a loan from them and say it's a 12 month loan and you only need the money for 1-2 months you will still pay the full interest amount so you can not pay off the note early with our incurring a full interest payment penalty
